citations.narrative:
A gate was left open and 9 fallow deer escaped a little over a week ago. Four deer were recovered but 5 deer remain
missing.
Failure to ensure facilities housing animals are maintained to contain the animals can result in animal escape with
possible inability to recover or injury/death.
Housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to
contain the animals.
Correct by: From May 31 forward.

There was a cockatoo being exhibited perched on a fence post. There was no shelter or shade provided.
Animals without shelter or shade from inclement weather may suffer from stress, low body temperature, and decreased
immune system function.
Outdoor housing facilities must provide adequate shelter and have areas of shade to prevent discomfort from direct
sunlight, precipitation, or wind.
Correct by: July 19, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
A gate was left open and 9 fallow deer escaped a little over a week ago. Four deer were recovered but 5 deer remain 
missing. 
Failure to ensure facilities housing animals are maintained to contain the animals can result in animal escape with 
possible inability to recover or injury/death. 
Housing facilities must be structurally sound and maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to 
contain the animals. 
Correct by: From May 31 forward. 
3.152(b) 
   
Facilities, outdoor 
There was a cockatoo being exhibited perched on a fence post. There was no shelter or shade provided. 
Animals without shelter or shade from inclement weather may suffer from stress, low body temperature, and decreased 
immune system function. 
Outdoor housing facilities must provide adequate shelter and have areas of shade to prevent discomfort from direct 
sunlight, precipitation, or wind. 
Correct by: July 19, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
